info.title: Travana API Documentation
info.description: Complete API documentation for Travana - A travel and vacation rental platform. This API provides endpoints for managing listings, reservations, users, blog content, and more.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all alerts with listings count
Retrieve approved comments for a specific blog (optionally includes user_liked if authenticated)

post.description: Post a comment on a blog (requires authentication)

get.description: Get all comments with filters (requires authentication)
Retrieve a paginated list of blogs with filtering, search and sorting

post.description: Create a new blog post (requires authentication)

get.description: Retrieve a single blog by ID or slug. Increments view count.

put.description: Update an existing blog (requires authentication). Also supports POST with _method.

get.description: Get trending/popular blogs based on view count
Get blogs related to the specified blog based on categories and tags
Get published blogs filtered by category slug
Get published blogs filtered by tag slug
Get published blogs filtered by author ID
Search blogs with advanced filters including date range

get.summary: Check if user liked a blog
Get users who liked a blog

get.description: Retrieve a list of all categories with their listings count

post.description: Create a new listing category with optional logo upload

get.description: Retrieve a single category by ID

put.description: Update an existing category (also supports POST with _method for file uploads)

delete.description: Delete a category (only if no listings are associated)

get.description: Retrieve a list of all cities with their listings

post.description: Create a new city with auto-generated slug

get.description: Retrieve a single city with its listings

delete.description: Delete a city (only if no listings exist)

get.description: Retrieve a list of all available currencies

post.description: Create a new currency with exchange rate

get.description: Retrieve a list of all facilities with listings count
Retrieve a paginated list of listings with filters

post.description: Create a new property listing with images, facilities, and alerts

get.description: Retrieve a single listing with all related data

put.description: Update an existing listing (also supports POST with _method for file uploads)

delete.description: Delete a listing (only if no reservations exist)

get.description: Retrieve a list of all reservations with optional date range filtering

post.description: Create a new booking reservation with overlap checking. When is_blocked is true, only listing_id, user_id, start_date, end_date, and nights are required.

is_blocked.description: If true, only listing_id, user_id, start_date, end_date, nights are required

put.description: Update an existing reservation with overlap checking

get.summary: Get a reservation by reference code

get.description: Retrieve a list of all users with their listings and reservations

delete.description: Delete a user (cannot delete yourself or users with existing data)

post.description: Authenticate a user and return a Bearer token
Revoke the current user's access token

get.description: Get the authenticated user's information

post.description: Create a new user account and return authentication token. A verification email will be sent.

message.example: User registered successfully. Please check your email to verify your account.

description.example: Smoking is not allowed inside the property

short_description.example: A stunning beach house with ocean views

excerpt.example: Discover the best places to visit...

is_blocked.description: If true, this is a blocked date range (not a real booking)
